title: Adjust header logo/brand size

requirements.text: Adjust the size and spacing of the header brand/logo area in `frontend/src/components/site/SiteHeader.tsx` (the left-side “ML Enterprise” / “Mokokchung” brand block) so it renders at a more appropriate, clearly visible size across mobile and desktop without breaking the header layout.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile and desktop, the header brand block on the left is visibly resized (larger or smaller as implemented) compared to the current `text-lg`/`text-xs` styling.
The header height, navigation alignment, and mobile menu button remain vertically centered and do not overlap the resized brand block.
Clicking/tapping the brand block still scrolls smoothly to `#home` and closes the mobile sheet if it is open.
No user-facing text is changed (brand still reads “ML Enterprise” and “Mokokchung”).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT must not be modified.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not add new navigation items or change section anchors/IDs.
Do not introduce backend changes or new backend endpoints.
